tool_description: Fetches real-time or historical exchange rates for specified currency pairs from multiple data sources.

base_currency.description: The base currency code (ISO 4217 format, e.g., USD, EUR)

target_currencies.description: List of target currency codes to get rates for

rate_date.description: Specific date for historical rates (ISO 8601 format)

data_source.description: Preferred data source: live, bank, historical

error_messages: Invalid currency code: Ensure all currency codes follow ISO 4217 standard (3-letter codes like USD, EUR).
Rate not available: The requested currency pair or historical date is not available from the data source.
Data source unavailable: The specified data source is currently unavailable, try using 'live' or 'bank'.
Date format error: Use ISO 8601 date-time format for rate_date parameter.
usage: Provide base_currency and target_currencies array. Optionally specify rate_date for historical rates and data_source preference. Returns exchange rates for all requested currency pairs.

base_currency.description: The base currency used for rate calculations

rates.description: Array of rate strings in format 'CURRENCY:RATE'

timestamp.description: Timestamp when rates were fetched or historical date

source.description: Data source used for the rates
